blocks.name: disjdsct
blocks.content: A disjoint collection is distinct, i.e. each set in this collection is different of all others, provided that it does not contain the empty set This can be expressed as "the converse of the mapping function is a function", or "the mapping function is single-rooted". (Cf. ~ funcnv ) (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 28-Feb-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm disjdsct(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wfun(ccnv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cdif(c2, csn(emptycls))))
  -| wi(w0, wdisj(s0, c0, c1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wfun(ccnv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))), wral(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wo(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wne(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1))))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, c0, w0, wral(hs1, c0, wo(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wne(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)))))
  ralrimiva(hs1, c0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wo(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wne(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1))))
  mpd(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wo(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wne(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1))), wo(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cin(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)), emptycls)))
  r19.21bi(hs1, c0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wo(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cin(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)), emptycls)))
  r19.21bi(hs0, c0, w0, wral(hs1, c0, wo(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cin(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)), emptycls))))
  sylib(w0, wral(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wo(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cin(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)), emptycls)))), wdisj(s0, c0, c1))
  disjorsf(s0, hs0, hs1, c0, c1)
  orim2d(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cin(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)), emptycls), wne(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)))
  ex(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wceq(cin(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)), emptycls), wne(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)))
  3anassrs(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cin(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)), emptycls), wne(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cin(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)), emptycls))), wne(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)), wceq(cin(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)), emptycls), wne(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), emptycls))
  simpr3(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cin(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)), emptycls))
  3ad2antr1(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cin(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)), emptycls), wne(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), emptycls))
  3imtr3i(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wne(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), emptycls), wsb(hs0, s0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))), wsb(hs0, s0, wne(c1, emptycls)))
  sbimi(hs0, s0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wne(c1, emptycls))
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wne(c1, emptycls), wcel(c1, cdif(c2, csn(emptycls))))
  eldifsni(c1, c2, emptycls)
  bitri(wsb(hs0, s0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wa(wsb(hs0, s0, w0), wsb(hs0, s0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))))
  sban(hs0, s0, w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  anbi12i(wsb(hs0, s0, w0), wsb(hs0, s0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  sbf(hs0, s0, w0)
  clelsb3f(hs0, s0, c0)
  3bitri(wsb(hs0, s0, wne(c1, emptycls)), wne(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), emptycls), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), wne(c1, emptycls)), wne(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), emptycls)))
  sbsbc(hs0, s0, wne(c1, emptycls))
  sbcne12(s0, cv(hs0), c1, emptycls)
  neeq2i(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), emptycls), emptycls)
  csb0(s0, cv(hs0))
  syl(wa(wceq(cin(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)), emptycls), wne(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), emptycls)), wne(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)), wne(cdif(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)), emptycls))
  biimpa(wceq(cin(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)), emptycls), wne(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), emptycls), wne(cdif(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)), emptycls))
  neeq1d(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), emptycls, cdif(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)), wceq(cin(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)), emptycls))
  biimpi(wceq(cin(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)), emptycls), wceq(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cdif(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1))))
  disj3(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1))
  difn0(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1))
  funcnv4mpt(hs0, hs1, s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, c1, cdif(c2, csn(emptycls)), w0)
  nfmpt1(s0, c0, c1)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  diff.cdif.s(s0, c2, csn(emptycls))
  diff.csn.s(s0, emptycls)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm disjdsct(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → Fun(`'(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c0)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈(c2 \ { ∅ }))
  ⊣ (w0 → ⊔(s0 ∈ c0, c1))
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, Fun(`'(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∀(hs1 ∈ c0,(hs0 = hs1 ∨[hs0 / s0]c1 ≠[hs1 / s0]c1))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, c0, w0, ∀(hs1 ∈ c0,(hs0 = hs1 ∨[hs0 / s0]c1 ≠[hs1 / s0]c1)))
  ralrimiva(hs1, c0, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), (hs0 = hs1 ∨[hs0 / s0]c1 ≠[hs1 / s0]c1))
  mpd(((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0)∧ hs1 ∈ c0), (hs0 = hs1 ∨[hs0 / s0]c1 ≠[hs1 / s0]c1), (hs0 = hs1 ∨([hs0 / s0]c1 ⋂[hs1 / s0]c1)= ∅))
  r19.21bi(hs1, c0, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), (hs0 = hs1 ∨([hs0 / s0]c1 ⋂[hs1 / s0]c1)= ∅))
  r19.21bi(hs0, c0, w0, ∀(hs1 ∈ c0,(hs0 = hs1 ∨([hs0 / s0]c1 ⋂[hs1 / s0]c1)= ∅)))
  sylib(w0, ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∀(hs1 ∈ c0,(hs0 = hs1 ∨([hs0 / s0]c1 ⋂[hs1 / s0]c1)= ∅))), ⊔(s0 ∈ c0, c1))
  disjorsf(s0, hs0, hs1, c0, c1)
  orim2d(((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0)∧ hs1 ∈ c0), hs0 = hs1, ([hs0 / s0]c1 ⋂[hs1 / s0]c1)= ∅, [hs0 / s0]c1 ≠[hs1 / s0]c1)
  ex(((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0)∧ hs1 ∈ c0), ([hs0 / s0]c1 ⋂[hs1 / s0]c1)= ∅, [hs0 / s0]c1 ≠[hs1 / s0]c1)
  3anassrs(w0, hs0 ∈ c0, hs1 ∈ c0, ([hs0 / s0]c1 ⋂[hs1 / s0]c1)= ∅, [hs0 / s0]c1 ≠[hs1 / s0]c1)
  syl2anc((w0 ∧(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs1 ∈ c0 ∧([hs0 / s0]c1 ⋂[hs1 / s0]c1)= ∅)), [hs0 / s0]c1 ≠[hs1 / s0]c1, ([hs0 / s0]c1 ⋂[hs1 / s0]c1)= ∅, [hs0 / s0]c1 ≠ ∅)
  simpr3(w0, hs0 ∈ c0, hs1 ∈ c0, ([hs0 / s0]c1 ⋂[hs1 / s0]c1)= ∅)
  3ad2antr1(w0, hs0 ∈ c0, hs1 ∈ c0, ([hs0 / s0]c1 ⋂[hs1 / s0]c1)= ∅, [hs0 / s0]c1 ≠ ∅)
  3imtr3i((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), [hs0 / s0]c1 ≠ ∅, [hs0 / s0](w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), [hs0 / s0]c1 ≠ ∅)
  sbimi(hs0, s0, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), c1 ≠ ∅)
  syl((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), c1 ≠ ∅, c1 ∈(c2 \ { ∅ }))
  eldifsni(c1, c2, emptycls)
  bitri([hs0 / s0](w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), ([hs0 / s0]w0 ∧[hs0 / s0]s0 ∈ c0))
  sban(hs0, s0, w0, s0 ∈ c0)
  anbi12i([hs0 / s0]w0, [hs0 / s0]s0 ∈ c0, w0, hs0 ∈ c0)
  sbf(hs0, s0, w0)
  clelsb3f(hs0, s0, c0)
  3bitri([hs0 / s0]c1 ≠ ∅, [hs0 / s0]c1 ≠ ∅, [hs0 / s0]c1 ≠ ∅, [hs0 / s0]c1 ≠[hs0 / s0]∅)
  sbsbc(hs0, s0, c1 ≠ ∅)
  sbcne12(s0, hs0, c1, emptycls)
  neeq2i([hs0 / s0]c1, [hs0 / s0]∅, emptycls)
  csb0(s0, hs0)
  syl((([hs0 / s0]c1 ⋂[hs1 / s0]c1)= ∅ ∧[hs0 / s0]c1 ≠ ∅), [hs0 / s0]c1 ≠[hs1 / s0]c1, ([hs0 / s0]c1 \[hs1 / s0]c1)≠ ∅)
  biimpa(([hs0 / s0]c1 ⋂[hs1 / s0]c1)= ∅, [hs0 / s0]c1 ≠ ∅, ([hs0 / s0]c1 \[hs1 / s0]c1)≠ ∅)
  neeq1d([hs0 / s0]c1, emptycls, ([hs0 / s0]c1 \[hs1 / s0]c1), ([hs0 / s0]c1 ⋂[hs1 / s0]c1)= ∅)
  biimpi(([hs0 / s0]c1 ⋂[hs1 / s0]c1)= ∅, [hs0 / s0]c1 =([hs0 / s0]c1 \[hs1 / s0]c1))
  disj3([hs0 / s0]c1, [hs1 / s0]c1)
  difn0([hs0 / s0]c1, [hs1 / s0]c1)
  funcnv4mpt(hs0, hs1, s0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), c0, c1, (c2 \ { ∅ }), w0)
  nfmpt1(s0, c0, c1)
  eqid((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))
  diff.cdif.s(s0, c2, { ∅ })
  diff.csn.s(s0, emptycls)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
}
